Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 25(1)
Legal_Rule: Under IRPA s. 25(1), immigration officers must consider humanitarian and compassionate grounds, including the best interests of a child, without applying hardship thresholds or basic needs tests

Key_Evidence_Considered: Leticia's Canadian citizenship, lack of connection to Brazil, family support in Canada
